lines.text: It is the smartest way to lie - just tell the truth, except for the parts that really matter.
I'm Catholic, Captain, I believe in anything that makes me nervous.
[Dagwood has claimed to see a horse on board]
A horse is a horse.
Of course, of course.
She seems very committed.
She ought to be committed.
Captain, this is a Level One UEO sealed file. Opening it would be illegal.
Why do you think I came to you?
Good point.
Well, great is not just sheer physical excellence; great includes spiritual and intellectual excellence.
Tell me, is there anything you can't do?
Yeah, I'm having one heck of a time learning the bagpipes.
Bet you look good in the skirt.
Give whatever it takes, even if it takes more than you got.
The more I read, the more questions I have. Everytime I pass a library I get an anxiety attack.
I'll not be given the runaround by a flock of vapid lackeys!
Captain Bridger must have a good reason for his actions.
He certainly does - he's lost his mind.
It was Neptune, Commander
Right. The guy who invented the horse.
That's the guy!
Do you ever laugh, Commander.
Can't laugh, Lucas.
Why not?
Because when I laugh, I'm too good-lookin'.
I see what you mean.
You're holdin' his horse, what he gave you is bull.
I didn't write it, I just read it in high school.
He was also the god of earthquakes - he'd stick his trident in the ground and shake it.
Oh, that's very scientific. Let's hope he doesn't flush the toilet.
This thing is wrapped tighter than Krieg's wallet.
Beneath the surface lies the future.
